PHRASE.LANG: There are lounge chairs, and then there is this lounge chair. You’ll never want to lie in another lounge chair again. [#Legal]
Il ya des chaises longues, et puis il ya cette chaise longue. Vous ne voudrez plus jamais de mentir dans une autre chaise longue encore. [#Legal]
Es gibt Lounge-Sessel, und es gibt diesen Lounge-Sessel. Du wirst nie wieder in einem anderen Lounge-Sessel liegen wollen. [#Legal]
Esistono chaise longue, e poi c'è questa chaise longue. Non vorrai distenderti su nessun'altra chaise longue. [#Legal]
Hay divanes y "el diván". Ya no querrás tumbarte en otro diván nunca. [#Legal]
There are lounge chairs, and then there is this lounge chair. You’ll never want to lie in another lounge chair again. [#Legal]
이 세상에는 그냥 라운지 의자가 있고, 바로 이 라운지 의자가 있습니다. 다시는 그냥 라운지 의자에는 앉고 싶지도 않을 것입니다. [#Legal]
There are lounge chairs, and then there is this lounge chair. You’ll never want to lie in another lounge chair again. [#Legal]
這是眾多種類休息椅中的其中一張，不過有了它，你將不會再想躺在其他休息椅上。 [#Legal]
這是眾多種類休息椅中的其中一張，不過有了它，你將不會再想躺在其他休息椅上。 [#Legal]
There are lounge chairs, and then there is this lounge chair. You’ll never want to lie in another lounge chair again. [#Legal]
